features.title: Optimized
features.sub_title: We optimize Modded OS to run smoothly on Android devices.

features.title: Do More, Worry Less
features.sub_title: These distributions are pre-confirgured and just work out of the box.

features.title: Pre-install Software
features.sub_title: Modded OS ships with software like VS Code, Chromium, Firefox etc.

features.title: Made Pretty
features.sub_title: Modded OS are pre-themed with cherry-picked themes and icons to look beautiful.
